text: @Mike_Pence Will you ever ask for forgiveness for pretending to be a Christian? You upheld Trump in his putting kids in cages, freeing criminals, making racial slurs, sexually assaulting women, using the church as a photo op, spraying teargas on peaceful protesters and Covid-19 negligence!!
